article_title: Santander Appoints Former FDIC Chief Sheila Bair to Board
article_text:
MADRID—Banco Santander SA appointed former U.S. Federal Deposit Insurance Corp. chairman Sheila Bair as an independent director, adding international clout to a board made up mostly of long-term allies of bank chairman Emilio Botín.

Ms. Bair rose to prominence as head of the U.S. banking regulator between 2006 and 2011, overseeing the nation's financial sector during a crisis in which hundreds of banks failed. As FDIC chairman, Ms....
